entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-03-06
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • 'ComWrappers.RegisterObjectForInterface' should skip a QI if 'inner' is provided #113239
  • Escape Analysis: Elide an array allocation in BitConverter.GetBytes pattern #113236
  • Question about Sse2 Intrinsics Tests And use of `private static` #113231
  • OpenSSL stores refreshing blocks multiple threads causing lock contention and thread pool exhaustion. #113227
    8.0.x
  • FileSystemWatcher NotifyFilter Not Respected on Linux #113220
  • Weird PublishAot memory differences without actually publishing #113219
  • [API Proposal]: Socket.SendFile{Async} overload with SafeFileHandle #113216
  • IncludeNativeLibrariesForSelfExtract does not include Mach-O universal binaries #113215
  • [mono] android crash : mono_generic_class_hash [metadata.c : 1928] #113204
  • [mono] android crash: mono_class_try_get_generic_class [class-accessors.c : 57] #113203
  • [mono] android crash: mono_get_image_for_generic_param [class.c : 2136] #113202
  • [mono] android crash: mono_class_is_open_constructed_type [class.c : 614] #113199
  • [mono] android crash : monoeg_g_hash_table_lookup [ghashtable.c : 321] #113198
  • [mono] android crash : monoeg_g_hash_table_insert_replace [ghashtable.c : 243] #113197
  • [mono] android crash: sgen_client_par_object_get_size [sgen-client-mono.h : 159] #113196
  • [mono] android crash #113195
  • Better supporting memory management in cgroup hierarchy #113193
  • Stack Overflow Exception in System.Private.CoreLib.DLL #113189
  • Specialize BinaryReader for UnmanagedMemoryStream similar to MemoryStream specialization #113187
  • Unexpected Behavior with SafeEvpPKeyHandle.OpenSsl.cs on Mac OS Sonoma 14.4.1 #113186

Closed

  • [NativeAOT] FormatException instead of ArgumentException in MethodBase.GetMethodFromHandle #113016
  • System.NotSupportedException: No data is available for encoding 1252 in .NET Core #113059
    10.0.0
  • When min major R2R version moves forward, consider some cleanups #98871
    Future
  • [Behaviour Proposal]: Allow resolving keyed dependencies without FromKeyedServicesAttribute #105913
    10.0.0
  • Intermittent SIGILL on build, restore and/or publish #112605
  • API Proposal: Thread.JoinAsync #40574
  • ManagedError: EndOfStringNotFound when starting Blazor in BlazorWebAssembly application with AoT #111151
    8.0.x
  • [mono] bug about wasm single thread using lock #112734
    10.0.0
  • ASP.NET Core - Getting model attribute parameter with attributes always crashes with invalid cast exception #113173
  • Wrong IServiceProvider instance in AddHttpClient callback #113200
  • [mono] android crash: mono_get_image_for_generic_param [class.c : 2136] #113201
  • [NativeAOT] don't generate __GetFieldHelper if struct is never boxed? #111544
    Future
  • Could not load file or assembly or one of its dependencies in PowerShell Module project target to netstandard 2.0 #113006

PullRequests

Created

  • Update dotnet-sos version #113240
    needs-area-label
  • Fix LdapConnection with AuthType.External #113238
    area-System.DirectoryServices
  • [APX] Complete EGPR encoding in X64 backend #113237
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • JIT: Fix edge likelihoods in `fgOptimizeBranch` #113235
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/9.0-staging] Backport #113095: Better ARM intrinsics implementation for dn_simdhash #113234
    Servicing-consider, needs-area-label, 9.0.x
  • Bounds checks: make MergeEdgeAssertions more precise #113233
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add test that AppContext.BaseDirectory is rooted #113232
    needs-area-label
  • [release/8.0-staging] Back port logical equivalent of #102838 #113230
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Security, 8.0.x
  • Fix providers EC export and key derivation with newer OpenSSL and add TLS with TPM keys tests #113229
    area-System.Security
  • Fixed some typos in the document: Implementation of Hardware Intrinsics in CoreCLR #113228
    community-contribution, needs-area-label
  • Update branding to 9.0.4 #113226
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Update branding to 8.0.15 #113225
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • JIT: Switch `optOptimizeLayout` to pre-layout optimization phase #113224
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Interpreter GC info stage 1: Use templates to specialize gc info encoder/decoder #113223
    area-CodeGen-Interpreter-coreclr
  • [browser] rename WasmPerfTracing #113222
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser, 10.0.0
  • new perf-build pipeline added #113221
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, perf-pipeline
  • Enable `UseSizeOptimizedLinq` by default on native AOT #113214
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [wasm] Don't log errors for unsupported cases in PInvokeCollector #113212
    area-Build-mono
  • [android][tests] Do not package unused CoreCLR libs when building test apks #113209
    os-android, area-Infrastructure-mono, 10.0.0
  • [release/8.0-staging] [QUIC] Update MsQuic library version #113206
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Net.Quic, 8.0.x
  • [release/9.0-staging] [QUIC] Update MsQuic library version #113205
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Net.Quic
  • [NativeAOT] Initialize COM before initializing FLS slot. #113194
    os-windows, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Mention base16 for DefaultStackSize #113192
    area-VM-coreclr
  • [Testing] Disable spin waiting when cpu quota limit is enabled #113184
    area-System.Threading, new-api-needs-documentation

Merged

  • Generate `.comment` section for ELF executables #113218
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • fix: correct ArgumentException formatting in NativeAOT #113016 #113163
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [browser] avoid locks in ST interop #113046
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 10.0.0
  • [release/9.0-staging] NativeAOT/Arm64: Do not overwrite gcinfo tracking registers for TLS #112549
    Servicing-approved, area-CodeGen-coreclr, 9.0.4
  • Pin SHAs for container images #113185
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Revert "Set AppContext.BaseDirectory and the lookup path for AssemblyDirectory to the directory containing the NativeAOT module" #113211
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Delete `ObjectNodeSection.IsStandardSection` #113217
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Fix encoding missed overridden properties #113167
    area-System.Text.Encoding, 10.0.0
  • Seed in the skeleton of ML-DSA based on current prototyping #112891
    area-System.Security, 10.0.0
  • Revert "Switch Ubuntu 24.04 testing to use Ubuntu 22.04 temporarily (#113138)" #113207
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Opt labels out of automated issue cleanup #113170
    area-Meta, 10.0.0
  • [release/9.0-staging] Use invariant culture when formatting transfer capture in regex source generator (#113081) #113150
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, 9.0.x
  • Speed up single-value SearchValues<string> candidate verification #108365
    area-System.Memory, 10.0.0
  • Reduce memory footprint of HTTP/2 connections #112719
    area-System.Net.Http, 10.0.0
  • [browser] Pass configured config name to loadBootResource #113210
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser, 10.0.0
  • [QUIC] Update MsQuic library version #113159
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • [10.0/preview-2] JIT: disable array stack allocation #113181
    Servicing-approved, area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Downgrade MethodTables used in reflection invoke #111610
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Fix build breaks #113179
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [Wasm] Improve error logging for ES6 module assertion #113131
    community-contribution, needs-area-label
  • [PERF] Add missing ScenarioArgs to the android device startup test runs #113182
    area-Infrastructure, perf-pipeline
  • Doc fixes for .NET 10 Preview 1 update #113027
    needs-area-label
  • Establish runtime-diagnostics pipeline #113169
    area-Infrastructure-libraries

Updated

  • [mono] dn_simdhash_ght_compatible optimizations for ARM64 #113241
    needs-area-label
  • Use LKG for inbuild projects #113243
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr, arch-riscv
  • Remove helper method frames from Monitors #113242
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Publish dotnet/runtime using standard Arcade Publish tooling #111934
    area-Infrastructure
  • [cDAC] Stack walk support more Frame types #112997
    enhancement, area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Handle KilledRegisters more efficiently in LinearScan::processKills() #111004
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Compress SafeSocketHandle.Unix booleans #112417
    area-System.Net.Sockets
  • Fix constrained call corner cases #111178
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Add CreateChained to RateLimiter #107230
    area-System.Threading, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • [release/8.0] Fix `BigInteger.Rotate{Left,Right}` for backport #112992
    NO-MERGE, Servicing-approved, area-System.Numerics, 8.0.16
  • [release/9.0] Fix `BigInteger.Rotate{Left,Right}` for backport #112991
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Numerics, 9.0.4
  • [release/9.0-staging] Backport "Use FLS detach callback as a thread termination notification. Another try." #113055
    NO-MERGE, Servicing-approved, area-VM-coreclr, 9.0.5
  • Handle relative path loading on non-Windows for AppContext.BaseDirectory on NativeAOT #113171
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [JIT] Enable conditional chaining for Intel APX #111072
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, apx
  • Separate code manager for the interpreter #112985
    area-CodeGen-Interpreter-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • [browser][http] mute JS exceptions about network errors + HEAD verb #113014
    arch-wasm, area-System.Net.Http, os-browser, 10.0.0
  • JIT: Avoid rotating/splitting loop bodies during 3-opt layout #113101
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • arm64: Add return cases into optimise bools #112945
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 10.0.0
  • Make Number.FormatBigInteger JIT-firendly #113165
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • Avoid `Unsafe.As` in `BitConverter` #112616
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution, reduce-unsafe
  • [browser] Add application environment to boot config #113164
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser, 10.0.0
  • arm64: Optimise GT/GE/LT/LE comparisons in return statements #112863
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • JIT: Fix Lowering::LowerRange #113172
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/8.0-staging] remove extra assert from WinHttp handler #112861
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Net, 8.0.x
  • Delete `BBF_FAILED_VERIFICATION` and `BBF_FUNCLET_BEG` #93483
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [mono] Fix detecting [DisableRuntimeMarshalling] in MarshalingPInvokeScanner. #112981
    area-Interop-mono
  • [RISC-V] Fix JitDisasmDiffable #113161
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • [release/8.0-staging] [browser] Remove experimental args from NodeJS WBT runner #113008
    Servicing-approved, arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono, os-browser, 8.0.x
